question: Cancer Awareness T-Shirt Ideas?
question_content: Here is the story, I would like to have a fundraiser at my school for a friends mom. She was diagnosed with Cancer and my main idea was to have a 'pink out' at our basketball game, where people could buy a t-shirt for $10 get into the game for free and get a t-shirt and all the money raised was to go to the family to help with bills and to cancer research. Does anyone have an idea where I could get that many t-shirts from? I will take any suggestions!

answers.answer_content:
There are a lot of websites that sell T-shirts related to cancer with logos on them.  www.zazzle.com is one of them.  You may need to charge more than $10 for T-shirts.

If it is breast cancer research you are focusing on, one of the common logos is "Not Afraid to Wear Pink."
